okay!

I've given first attack initiative to the ark defenders as well as t=
hose rushing to get to the ark from the black fortress. With nearly all the=
 minions present and only the ark (no city) defenses this will probrably be=
 a tough battle.
(I had hoped more players would have shown up)

But someth=
ings are different, such as everyone can see the enemy coming, and all the =
minions - except for Scourge are visible, but hard to hit initially with al=
l the sweep floating around.

So relax, and enjoy, the goals I have are not=
 to destroy everyone but to have fun, to close the story arcs opened by the=
se new minions, to shake things up, and to give the combat types their mome=
nt to shine.

I await your posts. Game on!

Preston
